nodes.text: The Ebruchi Pirates referred to a loose confederacy of aggressive nomadic Ebruchi pirate clans who controlled a handful of star systems in the Unknown Regions, to which they prowled the edges of, looking for prey that wandered in from the Outer Rim Territories or Wild Space. The Ebruchi Pirates were mainly composed of Ebruchi, but the group accepted others into their ranks, usually outcasts from the various alien species found in the Unknown Regions.
